verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H4150>them,<s%> 'The set feasts of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which you shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations,<s%> even these are my set <S%H4150>feasts.<s%>

<S%H8337><s%>"'Six <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H4399>work<s%> be <S%H6213>done:<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> of solemn <S%H7677>rest,<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no kind of <S%H4399>work.<s%> It is a <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>
<S%H4150><s%>"'These are the set feasts of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> even <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations,<s%> which you shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> in their appointed <S%H4150>season.<s%>
In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> day of the month in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6453>Passover.<s%>

On the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the same <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread.<s%>
In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation.<s%> You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>regular<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

But you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%> In the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>regular<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H935>them,<s%> 'When you have come into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H7114>you,<s%> and shall reap its the <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> then you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> of the first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest:<s%>

and he shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> for <S%H4283>you.<s%> On the next day after the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall wave <S%H5130>it.<s%>

On the <S%H3117>day<s%> when you <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf,<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> a male <S%H3532>lamb<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> with it shall be <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma;<s%> and the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> with it shall be of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> neither <S%H3899>bread,<s%> nor roasted <S%H7039>grain,<s%> nor fresh <S%H7039>grain,<s%> until this <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you have <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of your <S%H430>God.<s%> This is a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

<S%H5608><s%>"'You shall count from the next <S%H4283>day<s%> after the <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> from the <S%H4283>day<s%> that you <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> of the wave <S%H8573>offering;<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>Sabbaths<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8549>completed:<s%>

even <S%H5704>to<s%> the next <S%H4283>day<s%> after the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> you shall <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

You shall bring <S%H935>out<s%> of your <S%H4186>habitations<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3899>loaves<s%> of bread for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> offering made of <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour.<s%> They shall be <S%H644>baked<s%> with <S%H2557>yeast,<s%> for first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

You shall <S%H7126>present<s%> with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H259>old,<s%> one <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%> They shall be a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> with their meal <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and their drink <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> even an <S%H4503>offering<s%> made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> with the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs.<s%> They shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

You shall make <S%H7121>proclamation<s%> on the <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> there shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> to <S%H6213>you;<s%> you shall do no <S%H5656>regular<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%> This is a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

<S%H7114><s%>"'When you reap the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall not <S%H3615>wholly<s%> <S%H7114>reap<s%> into the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of your <S%H7704>field,<s%> neither shall you <S%H3950>gather<s%> the <S%H3951>gleanings<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest:<s%> you shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> them for the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> and for the <S%H1616>foreigner.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7637><s%> 'In the seventh <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> shall be a solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%> to <S%H2146>you,<s%> a memorial of <S%H8643>blowing<s%> of <S%H6944>trumpets,<s%> a holy <S%H4744>convocation.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>regular<s%> <S%H4399>work;<s%> and you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H389>"However<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of this <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement:<s%> it shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> to <S%H6031>you,<s%> and you shall afflict <S%H5315>yourselves;<s%> and you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no kind of <S%H4399>work<s%> in that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> for it is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
For <S%H5315>whoever<s%> it is who shall not <S%H6031>deny<s%> himself in that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H5315>Whoever<s%> it is who <S%H6213>does<s%> any kind of <S%H4399>work<s%> in that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H5315>person<s%> I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no kind of <S%H4399>work:<s%> it is a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

It shall be a <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> of solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%> for <S%H6031>you,<s%> and you shall deny <S%H5315>yourselves.<s%> In the <S%H8672>ninth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> from <S%H6153>evening<s%> to <S%H6153>evening,<s%> you shall <S%H7673>keep<s%> your <S%H7676>Sabbath.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2568><s%> 'On the fifteenth <S%H3117>day<s%> of this <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tents<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>regular<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> On the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> to <S%H7126>you;<s%> and you shall offer an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> It is a solemn <S%H6116>assembly;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>regular<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

<S%H4150><s%>"'These are the appointed feasts of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which you shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations,<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and a meal <S%H5930>offering,<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> and drink <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> <S%H1697>each<s%> on its <S%H3117>own<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%>

besides the <S%H7676>Sabbaths<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and besides your <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> and besides all your <S%H5088>vows,<s%> and besides all your freewill <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> which you <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H2568><s%>"'So on the fifteenth <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> when you have <S%H622>gathered<s%> in the <S%H8393>fruits<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a solemn <S%H7677>rest,<s%> and on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a solemn <S%H7677>rest.<s%>

You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of <S%H1926>goodly<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> <S%H3709>branches<s%> of <S%H8558>palm<s%> <S%H6057>trees,<s%> and boughs of <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and <S%H6155>willows<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook;<s%> and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

You shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> it a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H8141>year:<s%> it is a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations;<s%> you shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> it in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
You shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%> All who are <S%H249>native-born<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths,<s%>

that your <S%H1755>generations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I made the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths,<s%> when I brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>'"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>declared<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the appointed <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
